author: ate
msg: - removed Spring MVC HandlerMethod customization/extensions: runtime state and context management reimplemented and separated out from Spring customizations
- simplified HandlerMapping handling by collapsing Routed and Nested handling into one (Nested supported Routed already anyway)
- Changed Nested- prefix to PageFragment- to better reflect and align with both the configuration model and the practical use-cases
- completed support for PageFragment method handler invocations (.e.g like POSTing of a PageFragement controlled form)
- HandlerMethodContext expanded with full resolution and lookup of other / related /sibling contexts and providing reverse url path productions for them
- Added Route.referenceId to support lookup of a specific route based HandlerMethodContext, e.g. like for a dynamically mapped JCR repository based binary resources service
- full support for HandlerMethodContext reverse path lookup through hmvc:path JSP tag (and thus also Freemarker)

author: chrisdollin
msg: Stripped out repair and foreign libs, added pom, suppressed jdbc.

author: hwright
msg: Only define a private function on platforms where we actually use it.
All the other callers are protected by similar define guards.
